text:
Hi al! I work at the microscopy innovation centre at KCL and find myself with an almost finished LLS build. <@U01HDFX11PT> kindly pointed me in the direction of this channel. I was hoping to find out if people have a fixed perfusion system in use and if so could give any recommendations?
And secondly I saw the above discussion about dyes for the dye alignment. In addition to that, what do you tend do for different laser lines - do you align them to the 488 laser and fine tune them with tetraspeck bead samples or do you use additional dyes for them? 
Thanks in advance for any pointers :)
